description: Contains purchase order header information for orders placed with suppliers.

columns.name: PurchaseOrderID
columns.description: Primary key. Unique identifier for each purchase order.

columns.name: OrderDate
columns.description: Date the purchase order was placed.

columns.name: ContactPersonID
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for the supplier contact.

columns.name: ExpectedDeliveryDate
columns.description: Expected date for delivery of goods.

columns.name: SupplierReference
columns.description: Supplier's reference number for this order.

columns.name: IsOrderFinalized
columns.description: Indicates if the order has been finalized and sent.

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Additional comments on the purchase order.

columns.name: InternalComments
columns.description: Internal notes not shared with supplier.

columns.name: LastEditedBy
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for last editor.
